    • Constructor Detail

      • Axis

        public Axis(RectangularPlot parent,
            Axis.Scale scale,
            Axis.Orientation or,
            java.awt.Point origin,
            int size,
            double min,
            double max,
            int step,
            int labelOffset)
        Add a new Axis
        Parameters:
        parent: - The parent plot
        or: - Orientation either HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL
        origin: - Origin point of the axis
        size: - Length of the axis relative to the parent plot (0 is maximum)
        min; - Minimum Value of the axis
        max: - Maximum Value of the axis
        step: - Number of steps
        labelOffset: - Location of the Value labels, relative to the axis
